title: Wild rabbit and morel stew with olive oil mash
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 wild rabbit, cut into eight serving pieces
3 rashers smoked streaky bacon, cut into lardons
40g/1½oz dried morel mushrooms, soaked in 150ml/5fl oz warm water for at least 30 minutes
1kg/2lb 2oz floury potatoes, such as King Edward or Maris Piper, peeled, cut into equal-sized pieces
salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 tbsp chopped fresh flatleaf parsley, to serve
